fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may choose another acting Mafia member at night and "store" their night action if their night action would've been successful (you may even store kills), stopping it from occurring that night.
- Alternatively, you may allow a Mafia member to act twice for whatever action they are performing (even killing) at the cost of them being unable to act (or the Mafia unable to kill) on the following night unless they were roleblocked.
- At any time and in addition to either of your other abilities, you may use a stored action on the player(s) it was going to be used on at night or at any time, and you may use multiple stored actions at once. Stored actions being used are unstoppable. If you use a stored kill, things that would've occurred with the kill (such as a successful Janitor cleaning) on the night you stored them will be copied as well.
